Routing Number: {routingNumber}
Account Number: {accountNumber}
You must include the following note in your transaction: {note}

netkiSignUpEmail.subject: Start your onboarding process with Netki
text: Please download the MyVerify app from your favorite store and insert the access code when prompted

marketSpaceIntroduction.subject: Introduction to the New Portal
text: Dear {firstName},

Welcome to the new MarketSpace Capital Investor Portal. Here, you can browse through our offerings and invest at any time, from any device. You can even manage your entire investment portfolio with secure access to documents, transactions, and investment performance including consolidated reporting that summarizes exposures and performance across all investments.
Within this portal you will find all closing documents, statements, tax documents, as well as project updates and information regarding your investments.
{activationLink}

MarketSpace Capital is committed to ensuring a comprehensive and straightforward investor experience for our investors. If you have trouble at any time during registration, please call us at 281-766-9784 for immediate assistance or email us at info@marketspacecapital.com.
Thank you for joining the {sponsorTitle} Investor Portal, and for being part of our family of investors.

marketSpaceNewUserSignUpEmailForUser.subject: New User Signs Up
text: Hello {firstName},
Thank you for creating an account with MarketSpace Capital. We invite you to {consultationLink} with one of our team members to learn more about the company and hear about upcoming opportunities.
If you have any questions or feedback, do not hesitate to contact us at info@marketspace.capital or 281-766-9784. We look forward to hearing from you!
Regards,

marketSpacePasswordReset.subject: Password Reset
text: {firstName},

It appears you requested your password be reset on the MarketSpace Capital Investor Portal. If you did not request a login or password reset, you can ignore this message. To reset your password, please click the following link, or copy and paste it into your web browser:
RESET MY PASSWORD
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us at 281-766-9784 or info@marketspace.capital.

marketSpaceDocumentSubscriptionReminderE.subject: Document Subscription Reminder
text: Hi {firstName},
We noticed you started signing your subscription documents for {projectName} but have not yet completed them. If you would like to finish the subscription process, you can resume {resumeLink}.
If you have any questions about the offering, please reach out to your MarketSpace Capital representative or email us at info@marketspacecapital.com and we will get back to you in a timely manner.
Kindest Regards,

sharesSoldBackNonBlockchain.subject: Transfer of Shares from your Account
text: Dear {firstname} {lastname},
We have transferred some shares from your account. You will find your new balance immediately in your dashboard.
Shares Transferred: {tokens} {title}
Nominal {currency} {nominal}
Premium {currency} {premium}

sharesTransferredNonBlockchain.subject: Transfer of Shares to your Account
text: Dear {firstname} {lastname},
We have transferred some shares to your account. You will find your new share balance immediately in your dashboard.
Shares Transferred: {tokens} {title}
Premium {currency} {premium}

sharesTransferred-Admin.subject: {shareClassName} | Finalized investment - {fullName}
text: A new investment has been finalized for {shareClassName} Offering.
We have transferred some shares to your account. You will find your new share balance immediately in your dashboard.
Offering: {shareClassName}
Investing Entity: {fullName}
Invested Date: {date}
Investment Amount: {price}
Primary Investor: {fullName}
Investor Email: {email}
Investor Phone: {phoneNumber}

marketSpaceDocumentSubscriptionCompleted.subject: Document Subscription Completed
text: Hi {firstName},

Your subscription agreement for {projectName} has been received and is under review by our team.  Once you/your entity has been verified as an accredited investor you will receive wiring instructions to complete your investment.
If you have any questions, feel free to call us at 281-766-9784 or email us at info@marketspacecapital.com
Once again, we look forward to partnering with you on this and more projects to come.
Regards,

marketSpaceFinalizedInvestmentEmail.subject: Receipt of Funds
text: {firstName},
Congratulations! We have received your funds and your investment in the {projectName} offering has been finalized.

Closing documents related to this investment are available in the DOCUMENTS menu of the investor portal, which includes your fully executed subscription agreement and your investor accreditation verification. Ongoing status reports and periodic financial summaries/statements will be posted in the News / Updates section of the investor portal as they become available. Keep up with the value of your portfolio in the “My Portfolio” menu.
Click the link below to access the portal now:
{marketSpaceLink}
If you have any questions about the investment process or require some personal assistance, please contact us at 281-766-9784 or info@marketspace.capital.
Regards,

entityAccreditationApproved.subject: Entity accreditation Approved
text: Your entity accreditation has been approved, the wiring instructions are now visible in your portfolio.
Regards,
